alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 29 at 1:03PM MST until November 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
